circumstances: Upon landing at Chita-Kadala Airport, the right main landing gear collapsed. This caused the right wing to struck the ground and the aircraft slid several yards then veered off runway to the right and came to rest. While all 32 occupants were uninjured, the aircraft was damaged beyond repair.
probable_cause: The right main landing gear collapsed upon landing after the kingpin arm of the folding brace mount failed due to manufacturing defect.
